name: LEGACY BUILDINGS, LLC v. Thomas R. LOGAN, Jr., et al.

parties:
LEGACY BUILDINGS, LLC
v.

attorneys: The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39439) is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
LEGACY BUILDINGS, LLC
v.
Thomas R. LOGAN, Jr., et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided November 8, 2016
Thomas R. Logan, Jr., self-represented, in support of the petition.
Kevin B. Carroll, in opposition.
The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39439) is denied.
